sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.AISSearchSourceAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>AISSearchSourceAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var AISSearchSourceAjax = Class.create(); AISSearchSourceAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { getSearchSourceTableAndCondition : function(){ var sysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'); var gr = new GlideRecord("ais_search_source"); gr.get(sysId); return JSON.stringify({ table: gr.datasource.source.toString(), condition: gr.condition.toString() }); }, type: 'AISSearchSourceAjax' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-07-03 17:34:20</sys_created_on> <sys_id>66c276155b311010e91728582d81c7a8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AISSearchSourceAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Search Filters" source="com.glide.search.filters">35f2c58f6d6620100acb70b353433044</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_66c276155b311010e91728582d81c7a8</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-07-13 04:41:50</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>437</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
